programme.title: The Struggle 2: The Dilemma
programme.desc: Darnell gets released from jail and tries to take back control of his territory. Now that Tracey has left and moved to Atlanta with her mom...her sister Stacey is seeking revenge.

programme.title: Lacee
programme.desc: Four talented girls from different backgrounds form a R&B group with the intentions of being the best. They will soon find out that their dark journey consists of sex, power, and betrayal.

programme.title: Lacee: Rise 2 the Top
programme.desc: After a run in the girl group LACEE, Karin decides to step out on her own as a solo artist. As she preps for her solo debut, a former lover brings out a new artist that will compete, for the reigning spot as the new R&B diva.

programme.title: Loyalty
programme.desc: When independent drug dealer, Buttons, learns his girlfriend used to be his competitor, T Bones, longtime side chick, and believes they might still be messing around, it's on. T Bones' family is strong and makes sure no one crosses them by any means.

programme.title: Loyalty 2: The Return of T Bone
programme.desc: After making bail, the notorious killer and drug lord T Bone returns to the streets of Harlem, NY to clean up the family business and tie all loose ends. But once again the tables are turned when T Bone is betrayed by someone close.

programme.title: Mama Jones
programme.desc: Mama Jones is very territorial when it comes to her family since the murder of her eldest son a few years back. More problems occur when her youngest son moves back home with his girlfriend and their little surprise.

programme.title: Knee Deep
programme.desc: A young woman goes through a transformation to become a force to be reckoned with after witnessing a traumatic event. After learning about the game from her boyfriend and the art of the hustle, lies and deceit begin to tear her world apart.

programme.title: No Disrespect
programme.desc: Milk has run the streets efficiently in his father’s absence. After 15 years in prison, his father Bull, has returned to claim what is rightfully his.

programme.title: Heavy
programme.desc: When being young and hood rich is no longer a priority Renz turns his focus to something physically and mentally finer. But when walls and barriers begin to break, things begin to get HEAVY and he realizes he has to choose between love and loyalty.

programme.title: Runway of Shadows
programme.desc: Sisters Ivy and Zara are separated at a very young age due to their father’s deceit. When Ivy and Zara unexpectedly cross paths at a prestigious runway show, the stage it set for a series of mysterious and unsettling events.

programme.title: The Devil Came to Duval
programme.desc: After surviving a suicide attempt, comedian Eli Thompson faces his past on his birthday, but a night out at the bar spirals into chaos when the Devil arrives. Eli must confront betrayal, revenge, and supernatural terror to survive.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Drug kingpin Jay looks to expand his drug empire with the help of his business partners, and his girlfriend Passion. However, Polo and Marco have their own agenda’s, which could lead to chaos, as a potential drug war descends upon Atlanta.

programme.title: Vanity Flaw
programme.desc: Mallory is a young ambitious woman with dreams of becoming a successful dance choreographer in the industry. Being a risk taker, Mallory decides to dance at a strip club for one night after losing a dare, only to be captured by an obsessive man with a fetish for strippers and violence.

programme.title: Ultimatums
programme.desc: Roman visits recently engaged Luke and his sexually frustrated fiancé Mya. Mya is forced into an internal battle between being faithful to her fiancé and sexual tension between their new house guest who has an ulterior motive of his own.
